name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic Step in Summer All in One Pack
summary: With the summer approaching, CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic Step in Summer ALL in ONE Pack offers content that expresses Japan's fickle weather and one's feelings this time of year. 6 Events 3 Costume Sets 3 Hairstyles 3 Karaoke Dances
